body.name: XOPPOX 13.5’’ Laptop Computer, Newest UHD 3000 x 2000 Clear Screen PC Laptops, Windows 10 Home with Intel Celeron N4020 Dual Core 8GB RAM 128GB SSD for Students School Office, Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Performance At Its Core】Featuring Windows 10 Home and dual-core Intel Celeron Gemini Lake N4020 CPU(base frequency 1.1GHz, up to 2.8 GHz), the perfect combination of performance and power consumption helps your laptop computer run smoothly and reliably, you can enjoy videos or browse online efficiently

【Narrow Bezels 3K IPS Screen】13.5" Full HD 3000 x 2000 IPS clear display boasts impressive color and superior clarity. The 0.3inch Micro-edge bezel for wide viewing angles, making this Windows 10 laptop suitable for reading articles, browsing websites, and watching movies and series

【Premium Storage for Intense Multitasking】 Powered by 8GB DDR4 RAM and 128GB SSD storage, the XOPPOX notebook offers an ideal platform for addressing various productivity and business tasks. With te Micro-SD(up to 256 GB) card slot, you can add and swap extra storage as required

【Stay Connected Anywhere】Video conferences, telecommuting, online classes, watching dramas at home can't do without stable WiFi5. Built-in 2.4G WiFi with IEEE 802.11 ac/b/g/n keeps XOPPOX business laptop going strong even as more devices join the network. Bluetooth 4.0 makes it free to connect with your Bluetooth speakers/earphones. Easy to connect with your TV or projector via HDMI, and the full-function Type-C port can support extending to connect with more USB ports

【External Ports Meet All You Need】 Ready to connect to all your peripherals, this student laptop has connections in all the right places, including 1 x Type-C port, 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x Micro HDMI, 1 x Headphone/ Microphone Combo Jack, 1 x DC port, and 1 x micro SD slot. With the lightest and slim design(weighs 2.58 lb and less than 1 inch thick), and up to 10 hours-lasting battery life gives you the flexibility to work or play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best laptop for business/student use, but slow CPU.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best laptop I have ever tried. What I like most is the aspect ratio of the screen. It is actually usable for work. I can write documents, do spreadsheets, etc. easily. None of that wide-screen movie watching. The resolution is fantastic as well--I can read tiny scripts. The size and weight are perfect. I only wish the CPU speed was higher at 2.0 GHz or better. This one runs at only 1.0 GHz.The only problem I have had is that I cannot get Windows 10 to connect to my Wifi router. I have spent weeks trying different settings, etc. but to no avail. My modem/router is an old DSL model using 802.11b/c protocol and this laptop is fixed with a Realtek Wifi chip using 802.11ac protocol. The laptop sees my network and others alright, but I cannot connect. I have decided to return this laptop before the return window closes. Besides, I already have a desktop PC running Windows 10 Pro anyway. (The only way I was able to connect to the internet was to purchase a wired-ethernet-to-USB-C adapter and use that instead.)Update: I have decided it is time to switch ISP providers, get rid of the ten-year-old 12Mbps DSL modem/router, upgrade to the newer protocol, and get 50 Mbps for less cost (I don't need anything faster than that). Then, I might later reconsider buying this laptop again (if Xoppox upgrades the CPU) and possibly install Linux.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good if it was 50 bucks
reviews.reviewText: It's a cheap laptop that still costs to much. Buy something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Support for this computer?
reviews.reviewText: I have been unable to track down any way to contact the seller/manufacturer. My computer has had network issues from the start that i assumed i could fix with a simple download. I was unable to find a way to fix the problem, however, and could not find a contact number to seek help from the seller/manufacturer. Recently there have been problems with the physical parts: the top is loose and only stays open in a certain position. Today a screw fell out from the back along with its attachment part that must have come out of the inner part of the computer which was exposed until I gently closed the lid and pushed it all back together.Is there any help to be had out there? I'd sure appreciate it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t do it
reviews.reviewText: First one was not working. Returned and replaced. Worked for 3 months. Power cord broke. Asked seller for a place to buy replacement. No response. Then finally I had to buy a new one. 3 months lifespan. I just feel ripped off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's really not bad for the money - seems to work just as well as any other windows laptop so far.
reviews.reviewText: I have to give this machine a good review primarily as it was cheap as heck, yet seems to work fine so far and has good excellent resolution and supports up to 3000 x 2000 which is nice. I'll come back and remove some stars if the machine dies within a year, but so far so good.Several months have now passed. I use this laptop 2 or 3 times a week, usually while my primary computer is busy doing other things. It still works fine. No issues. It's not especially fast, it feels a bit flimsy so I would not want to carry it around with me all day (e.g probably not ideal for students taking it to all their classes) but it works. The track pad is pretty awful, so I switched to using a mouse, and I would say that one flaw in the design is that the rear of the screen pushes down on the desk when you open it all the way up, but for the most part it's fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Out of the box the mouse pad was not working properly..
reviews.reviewText: The size of the laptop is nice. The mouse constantly disappears and feels almost stuck. I've added an external mouse and it has the same issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking computer I was having problems conneccting to the internet. They reached out to me to help me with the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This computer has a lousy quality. Bad buy
reviews.reviewText: The computer physically does not have security on its screen, terrible quality
